instructions

Download SmartSteam or Greenluma
Updatear the game, running it from "PlayMaxPayne3.exe"
Download the crack, copy it where you installed the game, make backups in case ...
Run steam with Greenluma or SmartSteam
Join the network game in Tunngle
Run the game
Go to Multiplayer ---> join / host via LAN
Enjoy!
